title: Apartment Type Two Unit House For Sale in Nugegoda
details:
Apartment type three unit house at 71/1, Jambugasmulla Mawatha, Nugegoda, with 400 sq.ft. basement and covered parking for two vehicles with roller gate and surrounding wall with a gate to access.
10 ft. road with 3 p. turning circle.
Main hospitals, bus stands, railway station, colleges and international schools are 2-3 min. away.
5 min. drive to Lanka Hospitals.
Calm and peaceful residential area close to a parliamentary ministerial residence.
Easy access to Kohuwala, Papiliyana (Gamasabha Junction) and Kottawa Speedy Way (10 min.)
